item.title: What is Hugo
item.description: A framework for building websites The worldâ€™s fastest framework for building websites. https://gohugo.io/ It is very easy to preview your website. Run hugo server and then open http://localhost:1313 in your favourite webbrowser. And to build your website. hugo Publish the generated website in the public directory to a webserver. Done. For a deeper start have a look at the Quick Start guide. Resources gohugo.io Quick Start / Hugo Docs Hugo Project on Github Publish your site with Github Actions and Pages
